Verses: 1 dhevane, Neer Engalaik Kaivitteer, Engalaich Sidharadiththeer, Engalmel Kobamaayirundheer; Marupadiyum Engalidamaaith Thirumbiyarulum.
2 boomiyai Adhirappanni, Adhai Vedippaakkineer; Adhin Vedippugalaip Porundhappannum; Adhu Asaigindradhu.
3 ummudaiya Janangalukkuk Kadinamaana Kaariyaththaik Kaanbiththeer; Thaththalippin Madhubaanaththai Engalukkuk Kudikkak Koduththeer.
4 saththiyaththinimiththam Etrumpadiyaaga, Umakkup Bayandhu Nadakkiravargalukku Oru Kodiyaik Koduththeer. (selaa.)
5 umadhu Piriyar Viduvikkappadumpadi, Umadhu Valadhukaraththinaal Ratchiththu, Enakkuch Sevikoduththarulum.
6 dhevan Thamadhu Parisuththaththaikkondu Vilambinaar; Aagaiyaal Kalikooruven; Seegemaip Pangittu Sukkoththin Pallaththaakkai Alandhukolluven.
7 keeleyaadh Ennudaiyadhu, Manaaseyum Ennudaiyadhu, Eppiraayeem En Thalaiyin Belan, Yoodhaa En Niyaayappiramaanigan.
8 movaap En Paadhapaaththiram, Edhominmel En Paadharatchaiyai Erindhupoduven; Pelisdhiyaave, Ennimiththam Aarppariththukkol.
9 aranaana Pattanaththirkul Ennai Nadaththikkondupogiravar Yaar? Edhom Mattum Enakku Vazhikaattugiravar Yaar?
10 engal Senaigalode Purappadaamalirundha Dhevareer Allavo? Engalaith Thallivittirundha Dhevareer Allavo?
11 ikkattil Engalukku Udhaviseyyum; Manushanudaiya Udhavi Virudhaa.
12 dhevanaale Baraakkiramam Seyvom; Avare Engal Saththurukkalai Midhiththuppoduvaar.
